summary: The crazy and comical Mabel Simmons, otherwise known as Madea, tries to wrangle her fighting family together for a family dinner regarding the health of her niece Shirley.
cast: Tyler Perry|Loretta Devine|Cassi Davis|Shannon Kane|Isaiah Mustafa|Natalie Desselle Reid|Rodney Perry|Tamela J. title: Madea's Big Happy Family
